snippet.title: Puzzle Sculpt 🧩 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Solve 3D puzzles in your living room with Puzzle Sculpt, a relaxing MR puzzler for Apple Vision Pro through Apple Arcade. In this relaxing 3D puzzle game, you will decipher increasingly difficult number clues in mixed reality. Slowly remove blocks from the puzzle by logically carving away the unnecessary cubes. Once you complete the puzzle, you will reveal a cute collectible hidden within the cube. These decorations can be placed around your real-world space in mixed reality. There are plenty of puzzles and adorable collectibles for hours of cozy, puzzle-solving fun.

Puzzle Sculpt offers:
🧩 Mixed Reality Gameplay: Solve 3D puzzles in your living room.
😌 Relaxing Experience: Decipher number clues to logically carve away unnecessary cubes.
🌸 Adorable Collectibles: Reveal and decorate your space with cute collectibles hidden in your real-world space. 
🎮 Extensive Content: Over 70 puzzles and 12+ hours of engaging gameplay and cozy, puzzle-solving fun for all ages.

------------------------------------------ 

🧩 GET THE GAME 🧩 

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/puzzle-sculpt/id6479268606

------------------------------------------ 

👋 SCHELL GAMES LINKS 👋 

▸ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SchellGames 
▸ X - http://www.twitter.com/schellgames 
▸ Website - http://www.puzzlesculpt.com
▸ Discord - https://discord.com/invite/schellgames

------------------------------------------ 

 #puzzlesculpt #schellgames #applearcade #applevisionpro
